Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have one question regarding AMD CrossfireX setups and KSP. I have a 7970 crossfire setup and sadly my second card is never used with KSP. Even adding a AMD profile for the game is not activating the second card. I know this is not SQUAD problem but AMD drivers problem ( I already sent an issue report to AMD).

I would like to know if there are people suffering from this problem.

Regards,

From the KSP launcher have you gone into the furthest tab to the right? (I think it says "advanced" or something.)

There is an option for "AMD compatibility mode" I have no idea what it does, I use an AMD card as well and have tried playing with it checked/unchecked but I see no difference.

My card doesn't use crossfire though, so maybe that's what it's for?
